GirlCode1.GirlCode_Details: Her ex is off-limits forever. No guy is worth losing your best friend over.

GirlCode2.GirlCode_Details: What she tells you about him stays between you two. Loyalty over gossip, always.

GirlCode3.GirlCode_Details: If you see a red flag in her dating life, speak up—with love and honesty.

GirlCode4.GirlCode_Title: Hype Her Up, Don't Tear Her Down
GirlCode4.GirlCode_Details: Celebrate her wins, support her glow-up, and never compete with her for male attention.

GirlCode5.GirlCode_Details: If a guy is trying to cut her off from friends and family, that's a dealbreaker. Call it out.

GirlCode6.GirlCode_Title: Split the Bill or Offer to Pay
GirlCode6.GirlCode_Details: Financial independence matters. Never feel obligated to let a man pay if it makes you uncomfortable.

GirlCode7.GirlCode_Details: If something feels off about him, it probably is. Your intuition is your superpower—don't ignore it.

GirlCode8.GirlCode_Title: Have Each Other's Backs on Dates
GirlCode8.GirlCode_Details: Check-ins during dates, safe words for group hangouts, and always prioritize her safety over politeness.

GirlCode9.GirlCode_Details: Know your worth and let him put in the effort. A man worth having will show up for you consistently.

GirlCode10.GirlCode_Details: No relationship is worth your mental health, self-respect, or happiness. It's okay to walk away and start fresh.

GirlCode11.GirlCode_Details: Sporadic texts and last-minute plans aren't dating. You deserve consistency and intentionality.

GirlCode12.GirlCode_Details: Whether it's a joke that lands wrong or behavior that crosses the line, address it in the moment.

GirlCode13.GirlCode_Title: Don't Loan Money to Romantic Partners
GirlCode13.GirlCode_Details: Money and romance mix poorly. If he can't afford something, that's his problem to solve.

GirlCode14.GirlCode_Details: Let your close friends know where you're going on dates and who you're with for safety.

GirlCode15.GirlCode_Details: Having dealbreakers isn't being picky—it's being smart about what you accept in your life.

GirlCode16.GirlCode_Title: Don't Play Games to Keep Him Interested
GirlCode16.GirlCode_Details: If you have to pretend to be someone else or play hard to get, he's not the one.

GirlCode17.GirlCode_Title: Watch How He Treats Service Workers
GirlCode17.GirlCode_Details: A man's character shows in how he treats people who can't do anything for him.

GirlCode18.GirlCode_Details: If he's lied once, cheated once, or been disrespectful once, that's usually not the last time.

GirlCode19.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Career Over Her Relationship
GirlCode19.GirlCode_Details: A good man will lift her up professionally. Never encourage her to choose a guy over her dreams.

GirlCode20.GirlCode_Details: Your quirks, ambitions, and personality are features, not bugs. The right person will love all of you.

GirlCode21.GirlCode_Title: Know the Difference Between Love and Convenience
GirlCode21.GirlCode_Details: Just because he's comfortable doesn't mean he loves you. Real love includes effort and growth.

GirlCode22.GirlCode_Details: If you're fighting other women for his time, he's not worth fighting for.

GirlCode23.GirlCode_Details: Sometimes people we love see red flags we're too close to notice. Stay open to their perspective.

GirlCode24.GirlCode_Details: Don't assume you're exclusive. Have the conversation and make sure you're on the same page.

GirlCode25.GirlCode_Details: Your ambition, intelligence, and confidence are attractive. Never downplay them to make him comfortable.

GirlCode26.GirlCode_Details: You don't owe anyone access to your body, time, or energy. A boundary is enough.

GirlCode27.GirlCode_Details: Words are easy. Real apologies come with changed behavior over time.

GirlCode28.GirlCode_Title: Check In With Her During Relationship Issues
GirlCode28.GirlCode_Details: When she's going through a breakup or relationship drama, show up consistently and listen without judgment.

GirlCode29.GirlCode_Details: He's not a fixer-upper project. Love him for who he is now, not who he might become.

GirlCode30.GirlCode_Title: Know That Trauma Bonding Isn't Love
GirlCode30.GirlCode_Details: Going through drama together doesn't mean you're compatible. Real love is built on stability and respect.

GirlCode31.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Rewrite Your Narrative
GirlCode31.GirlCode_Details: If he constantly contradicts your memories or experiences, that's manipulation. Trust yourself.

GirlCode32.GirlCode_Details: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person. Enjoy your independence and freedom.

GirlCode33.GirlCode_Details: He should show up for you in meaningful ways, not just romantically. Check his actions, not his words.

GirlCode34.GirlCode_Details: Don't engage with his exes, his family drama, or unnecessary conflict. Your energy is precious.

GirlCode35.GirlCode_Details: If he's always on his phone around you, he's not present. You deserve full attention.

GirlCode36.GirlCode_Details: Stop hinting and guessing. Clear communication prevents misunderstandings and wasted time.

GirlCode37.GirlCode_Details: He texting back doesn't deserve a medal. Set the bar higher than basic human decency.

GirlCode38.GirlCode_Details: Does he communicate or shut down? Does he take responsibility or blame you? His conflict style matters.

GirlCode39.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Rush the Relationship
GirlCode39.GirlCode_Details: Love-bombing and moving fast are red flags. Healthy relationships develop at a sustainable pace.

GirlCode40.GirlCode_Details: Never become financially dependent on a partner. Keep your own income, savings, and resources.

GirlCode41.GirlCode_Details: A possessive, controlling man isn't protecting you—he's owning you. That's not love.

GirlCode42.GirlCode_Title: Listen When She Says He's Bad News
GirlCode42.GirlCode_Details: If your bestie sees something you don't, take it seriously. She might be the voice of reason you need.

GirlCode43.GirlCode_Details: After a few months, if he won't define the relationship, he's deciding for you. Choose clarity and walk away.

GirlCode44.GirlCode_Details: Whether she's taking time to heal or rushing into love, support her journey without judgment.

GirlCode45.GirlCode_Details: If he drinks excessively, uses drugs, or has addictive behaviors, that's a dealbreaker. You can't fix it.

GirlCode46.GirlCode_Details: Chemistry and love matter, but so do values, goals, and compatibility. Passion fades without a solid foundation.

GirlCode47.GirlCode_Details: Giving you the cold shoulder is manipulation. Demand communication or remove yourself from the situation.

GirlCode48.GirlCode_Title: Check His Relationship With His Mother
GirlCode48.GirlCode_Details: How he treats the main woman in his life reveals how he'll eventually treat you.

GirlCode49.GirlCode_Title: Don't Share Your Passwords or Codes
GirlCode49.GirlCode_Details: Privacy isn't secrecy. Keep your personal accounts and information to yourself for your own protection.

GirlCode50.GirlCode_Details: His past relationships matter. Ask about breakups, patterns, and what he learned. His answers reveal character.

GirlCode51.GirlCode_Title: Don't Sacrifice Sleep for Late-Night Texts
GirlCode51.GirlCode_Details: If he only wants to talk late at night, that's intentional. He's not prioritizing quality time with you.

GirlCode52.GirlCode_Details: If she decides to end it, celebrate her strength. Never pressure her to stay or take him back.

GirlCode53.GirlCode_Details: Check his social media behavior. Is he respectful? Does he have shady follows? Trust what you see.

GirlCode54.GirlCode_Title: Know That Great Sex Isn't a Relationship
GirlCode54.GirlCode_Details: Chemistry in bed doesn't mean compatibility in life. Don't confuse passion with partnership.

GirlCode55.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Control Your Circle
GirlCode55.GirlCode_Details: A good man wants you to have friends and life outside the relationship. Isolation is a control tactic.

GirlCode56.GirlCode_Details: Does he want marriage, kids, stability? Make sure his vision aligns with yours before investing deeper.

GirlCode57.GirlCode_Details: Confused feelings are usually someone keeping options open. Clarity is a bare minimum.

GirlCode58.GirlCode_Details: After heartbreak, show up consistently. Remind her of her worth and help her find herself again.

GirlCode59.GirlCode_Title: Don't Overlook How He Speaks About Women
GirlCode59.GirlCode_Details: Misogynistic jokes, disrespectful commentary about women—these aren't harmless. They reveal his worldview.

GirlCode60.GirlCode_Title: Trust the Relationship Feedback You Get
GirlCode60.GirlCode_Details: If multiple people express concern about your relationship, listen. Sometimes outside perspective is clarity.
